channel.title: Runing Telegram in Whonix
channel.description: I need to use telegram. I know telegram is not secure and private as it's marketed. But I need to use it and still be safe, so I want to use it over Tor. If I install telegram in my whonix it will be runing over tor by default or I need to change some settings ?

item.title: Runing Telegram in Whonix
item.dc:creator: whonixbest
item.description:
Patrick:

David:

But I need to use it and still be safe, so I want to use it over Tor.

Note: Tor doesn’t magically make insecure applications secure. Neither
Tor adds end-to-end encryption to applications that don’t support
end-to-end encryption.

Use TCP protocol, which is installed by default, or connect via server 127.0.1 and port 9150? How safer and safer and more anonymous?

Read full topic
